{{Description|A combat readiness liaison is awaiting your help outside the [[Stadium of the Sacred Flame]]'s [[Speaker's Chamber]]. As distinguished heroes, your unmatched expertise will provide invaluable insights by which the warriors of [[Natlan]]'s tribes may be honed...}}
'''Emblem of Steadfast Valor''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 5.3]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2025/01/09 10:00 - 2025/01/20 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above
* Complete [[Archon Quest]] [[Prologue]]: Act III "[[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]]"
* Complete the Archon Quest "[[Incandescent Ode of Resurrection]]" to get the best experience from this event.

===Summary===
* Complete tribe-specific challenges to obtain [[Primogem]]s, [[Hero's Wit]], [[Character Talent Material]]s, and other rewards. There are additional Tune-Up Goals within the challenges. Complete at least 1 Tune-Up Goal in the challenges for each of the tribes to earn special Commemorative Gifts. Complete the Archon Quest "Incandescent Ode of Resurrection" to view the contents of the Commemorative Gifts.
* There are a total of 6 challenges and 2 new challenges related to specific tribes will be unlocked on the first, third, and fifth days of the event.
* There are additional Tune-Up Goals within the challenges. Complete at least 1 Tune-Up Goal in the challenges for each of the tribes to earn special [[Emblem of Valor|Commemorative Gifts]].
* Complete the Archon Quest "Incandescent Ode of Resurrection" to view the contents of the Commemorative Gifts.

===Tutorial===
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Emblem of Steadfast Valor 1.png
|text1  = During "Emblem of Steadfast Valor" challenges, you must reach your goal within the time limit and collect as many {{Color|help|Trial Coins}} as possible.
|image2 = Tutorial Emblem of Steadfast Valor 2.png
|text2  = During the challenge, there will be higher-difficulty objectives that must be unlocked, known as {{Color|help|Tune-Up Goals}}. Complete these and successfully reach your destination to obtain more rewards and unlock new {{Color|help|Commemorative Gifts}}.
}}

;Tune-Up Devices
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Emblem of Steadfast Valor Tune-Up Devices 1.png
|text1  = Attack or interact with {{Color|help|Tune-Up Devices}} to unlock Tune-Up Goals.
|image2 = Tutorial Emblem of Steadfast Valor Tune-Up Devices 2.png
|text2  = Radiant Trial Coins {{Color|help|only exist for a fixed duration}}. After they have disappeared, they can no longer be collected.
}}

;Shock Drills
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Emblem of Steadfast Valor Shock Drills.png
|text1  = {{Color|help|Attack}} Shock Drills to activate them. they will release shockwaves that can reveal hidden Trial Coins.
}}

;Air Patrol Drones
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Emblem of Steadfast Valor Air Patrol Drones 1.png
|text1    = During the challenge, Air Patrol Drones placed by the tribal warriors will appear. These will follow a set flight path with a set distance before leaving the challenge arena.
|image2   = Tutorial Emblem of Steadfast Valor Air Patrol Drones 2.png
|text2    = Only bullets gained from {{Color|help|destroying Blast Balloons}} can damage Air Patrol Drones.
}}

==Commemorative Gift==
Completing at least one Tune-Up Goal from the Scions of the Canopy, the Children of Echoes, and the Flower-Feather Clan will allow the player to claim {{Item|Emblem of Valor}}.

If {{Quest|Incandescent Ode of Resurrection}} has not been completed, the following text will appear: 
* ''You haven't completed the Archon Quest "Incandescent Ode of Resurrection."<br>Complete the Archon Quest "Incandescent Ode of Resurrection" to use, thereby earning an "Emblem of Steadfast Valor" special gift.''
Additionally, the player will be given {{Item|Special Commemorative Letter}} instead.
